item.title: The Kaplan-Meier Estimatior in R
item.description: The Kaplanâ€“Meier estimator, often known as the product limit estimator, is a non-parametric statistic used to estimate the survival function using lifetime data. In this post, we will see how to estimate the survival function in this method using R.
